publications.name: MixLoRA: Enhancing Supervised Fine-Tuning of Language Models with Efficient Mixture of LoRAs.
publications.summary: Submitted to ICML 2025, currently under revision.

publications.name: DynMoLE: Boosting Mixture of LoRA Experts Fine-Tuning with a Hybrid Routing Mechanism
publications.summary: DynMoLE, a new method combining LoRA and Mixture of Experts, uses a dynamic routing strategy and an auxiliary Tsallis entropy loss to improve LLM fine-tuning, achieving significantly better performance and faster convergence on commonsense reasoning tasks compared to LoRA and MoLA.

publications.name: Mixlora: Enhancing large language models fine-tuning with lora-based mixture of experts
publications.summary: MixLoRA proposes a resource-efficient sparse Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) model built on LoRA to enhance performance in multi-task learning, achieving a 9% accuracy improvement and reducing GPU memory consumption by 40% and token computation latency by 30%.
